dc_title_s: Map of the United States of America
dc_description_s: 1 map : col. ; 36 x 56 cm.|Shows railroads and trails.|From one of Beer's county atlases, such as Atlas of Kalamazoo Co., Michigan. New York, F.W. Beers & Co., 1873.|Relief shown by hachures.|Includes table of distances for the Pony Express mail adn telegraph route.|Prime meridians: Washington and Greenwich.
